trans-unit.source: Defines a contract for how names of elements should be accessed within a particular XAML namescope, and how to enforce uniqueness of names within that XAML namescope.
trans-unit.target: 针对如何在特定的 XAML 名称范围内访问元素的名称，以及如何强制该 XAML 名称范围内名称的唯一性，定义一个协定。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by classes that have child elements that are intended to be reused through the template or defer metaphor.
trans-unit.target: 由具有旨在可重用通过模板或延迟隐喻的子元素的类实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: Templates, factories and similar constructs must have unique XAML namescopes that are separate from a main object graph and root XAML.
trans-unit.target: 模板、 工厂和类似的构造必须具有唯一的 XAML 名称范围，独立于主对象图和根 XAML。

trans-unit.source: The principle here is that there should be no name collisions when objects created from those child elements are introduced to an application's object graph, and so that DOM operations and XAML reference techniques that rely on the name identifier can rely on name uniqueness in each XAML namescope.
trans-unit.target: 下面的原则是，应该也没有名称冲突时创建这些子元素从对象引入到应用程序的对象图，以便 DOM 操作和依赖于的名称标识符的 XAML 引用技术可以依赖于名称在每个 XAML 名称范围中的唯一性。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此接口存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: WPF Usage Notes
trans-unit.target: WPF 用法说明

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the WPF class <xref:System.Windows.NameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 此接口由 WPF 类实现<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>。

trans-unit.source: Most XAML namescope operations in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] operate by using <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> instances, but information is occasionally communicated internally by using <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope> references.
trans-unit.target: 中的大多数 XAML 名称范围操作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]操作方式是通过使用<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>实例，但信息有时通信的内部使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>引用。

trans-unit.source: Examples of WPF classes that use a factory or defer metaphor combined with XAML representation are <xref:System.Windows.Style> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 使用工厂或延迟隐喻结合 XAML 表示形式的 WPF 类的示例包括<xref:System.Windows.Style>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: These implementations usually rely on the explicit versions of the interface methods available from the <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些实现通常依赖于从提供的接口方法的显式版本<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>类。

trans-unit.source: The name identifier for the object being requested.
trans-unit.target: 发出请求的对象的名称标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that has the provided identifying name.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有提供的标识名称的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object, if found.
trans-unit.target: 对象（如果找到）。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if no object of that name was found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到该名称的对象，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Valid name strings in XAML markup must match the requirements documented in [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 标记中的有效名称字符串必须匹配中所述的要求[XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的名称。

trans-unit.source: The specific element that the provided <c>name</c> refers to.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 <c>name</c> 所引用的特定元素。

trans-unit.source: Registers the provided name into the current XAML namescope.
trans-unit.target: 将提供的名称注册到当前的 XAML 名称范围中。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate names in a XAML namescope are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允许在 XAML 名称范围中的重复名称。

trans-unit.source: Do not permit duplicate names to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 不允许重复的名称进行注册。

trans-unit.source: If the input <paramref name="name" /> is already assigned to an existing element in the internal collection representation of the XAML namescope (even if it is the same as <paramref name="scopedElement" />), throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入<paramref name="name" />已分配给的内部集合表示形式的 XAML 名称范围中的现有元素 (即使它是与相同<paramref name="scopedElement" />)，引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Also consider throwing an exception if the provided name does not conform to [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).
trans-unit.target: 此外应考虑引发异常，如果提供的名称不符合[XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name to unregister.
trans-unit.target: 要注销的名称。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the provided name from the current XAML namescope.
trans-unit.target: 从当前的 XAML 名称范围中注销提供的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the input name does not exist, throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的名称不存在，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: You should remove the name and the previously registered element it refers to from the collection representation of the XAML namescope, so that the same name could potentially be registered again in the future.
trans-unit.target: 你应删除的名称和它引用的集合表示形式的 XAML 名称范围中，从以前注册的元素，以便相同的名称无法重新注册在将来。
